info.sourceTextContent: Se parecían con ese parecido que llamamos aire de familia, y eran, con todo, muy diferentes. La mayor de edad y menor de estatura, la del traje de seda, era trigueña, con ojos y pelo negros, labios colorados como una guinda y blanquísimos dientes, que mostraba riendo.
info.suspiciousTextContent: They looked as if they were of the airs of our family, and they were all different. The older and smaller in stature - with the dress, was brunette, with dark eyes and black hair, red lips like cherries and extremely white teeth that showed when she smiled
